      public void setPhotoProfile(boolean isProfile)
      A method to set the photoProfile boolean, indicating if it's the photo of an attendee's profile
      Parameters:
      isProfile - If the photo is an attendee's profile photo (true if it is)

    • getPhotoProfile

      public boolean getPhotoProfile()
      A method to return the photoProfile boolean, that indicates if the photo is an attendee's profile photo
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating if the photo is an attendee's profile photo or not

    • deletePhoto

      public void deletePhoto()
      Removes the photo from the cloud storage. If it was an attendee photo, also reset the default parameter of the attendee

    • getBitmap

      public android.graphics.Bitmap getBitmap()
      Getter for the bitmap attribute of AdminPhoto
      Returns:
      The AdminPhoto's bitmap

    • setBitmapFromDB

      public void setBitmapFromDB(android.content.Context context)
      Sets the photo's bitmap by getting it from the database
      Parameters:
      context - The context in which the UIThread will run to get the bitmap

    • bitMapUpdated

      public void bitMapUpdated(android.graphics.Bitmap newBitmap)
      When the bitmap is updated asynchronously, this function gets called so that all instances using this bitmap value gets updated
      Parameters:
      newBitmap - The new bitmap value

    • updateWithBitmap

      public void updateWithBitmap(android.widget.ImageView view)
      Updates an imageView with the bitmap value of the AdminPhoto. If the bitmap has not been set yet, the view is added to a list who will get updated when the bitmap values is set.
      Parameters:
      view - The ImageView that will have its bitmap updated with the AdminPhoto's bitmap
